ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] hey ppl read this  if intrested in equestrielle
ygData.msgSnippet: ... grammar ... typing ... anyway ... elementary ... someone ... I didn t bother pointing out the numerous errors in capitalisation and punctuation. Actually,
ygData.messageBody:
lori smith wrote:
> Ok then you all want me to type with good grammer ok I will do

grammar

> so.......while i am typeing email's to you all at least. But my

typing

> friends have probably gotten used to me typeing that way so i am
> going to keep typeing on eq. But ok see .......am I typeing ok so
> far?? any way, I just think it is easier and faster so people dont

anyway

> have to wait forever to hear a response when they want it and
> especially while they are excited...am I correct? I am 14 years old
> and going on 9th grade, k-6 is elementry for me and 7 and 8 are

elementary

> middle school and 9-12 is high school..........so I have been going
> to school around 10 or 11 years, my mom put me in school when I was 5
> years old. Ok is everything all cleared up and all or does some one

someone

> else have a problem or challenge for me? c ya l8er......oops i mean
> see you all later-----lori

I didn't bother pointing out the numerous errors in capitalisation and
punctuation.

Actually, I'm not a grammar-nazi, but if someone tries to maintain that
they can do something then make several errors in doing it I feel
obliged to point them out. We learn from our mistakes it is true, but
only once they are pointed out.

I hope you and your friends enjoy EQ Lori, it is a great game, and if
they are fine with the way that you type then that's cool, but it is
worth learning the standards of the rest of society too so that when you
do need to communicate with people outside your peers you can do so with
ease.

Matt
